publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2306 Iain Smith: Balmerino Village—That the Parliament congratulates Balmerino in North East Fife on winning the Lady Jane Grosvenor Cup for Best Wee Village in Scotland in the Beautiful Scotland in Bloom Competition 2001 and, in particular, praises the efforts of the Balmerino 2000 group and the residents of Balmerino whose hard work and dedication has been rightly rewarded.
S1M-2306 Balmerino Village (lodged on 4 October 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2306 Balmerino Village (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2306 Balmerino Village (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2306 Balmerino Village (lodged on 4 October 2001) Tricia Marwick*
